titleStmt.title: A trve and perfect diurnall: of the most remarkeable passages in Ireland, from the second of April to this present. / Sent over by a gentleman of very good worth, and an eye-witnesse. To a brother of his in London.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman of very good worth and an eye-witnesse.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Edward Blackmore, at the signe of the Angel in Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
